entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
